sn26.5:4.2: “Yo kho, bhikkhave, cakkhusamphassajāya vedanāya uppādo ṭhiti … pe …
sn26.5:5.1: Yo manosamphassajāya vedanāya uppādo ṭhiti … pe …
sn26.5:5.3: Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, cakkhusamphassajāya vedanāya nirodho vūpasamo … pe …
sn26.5:5.5: yo manosamphassajāya vedanāya nirodho vūpasamo atthaṅgamo, dukkhasseso nirodho, rogānaṃ vūpasamo, jarāmaraṇassa atthaṅgamo”ti.
